name: Speakeasy Fix Hard
description:
Speakeasy, friend, for the year is 1929, and owning a bar in New York oftenly means a jam.

Protect your property, but make sure to do the opposite to ye dastard envious neighbor! 

How to play, you ask? Well, you have 30 seconds at your oponent`s bar to wreck it as much as possible! Mess stuff around, toss paint on the furniture and smash everything with a Mallet! 

After that, you'll be sent to your own bar and get 30 seconds to fix as much as you can from the damage your foe has caused to your dear estabilishment. That rascal!
